channel.title: Chaotics
channel.description: Okay I lost a lot of my bank about 40m + void n shizz when i got gang raped in deep wildi so I thought hell i may aswell get a chaotic since i'm down to 20m. I've been looking at the chaotic wep bonus's and the rapier was kind of appealing to me as I lacked a stab weapon and i'm going to start melee'ing more.. Basically, what chaotic in your opinion is the best? Which chaotic should I get? I have extreme potions, getting my void back soon, I pvm a lot and i pk too but pvm more atm. 78 attack, going to get 80 tommorow for the chaotic.., 91 range, 88 str, 66 def, 72 pray, 63 summon, 96 mage. What'd be good for me? I was thinking rapier?

item.title: Chaotics
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

rip4d:

Just get 88 dungeoneering, you’ll get another.

It’d be like 90 if i want another one.
Gotto buy stream first. I got the rapier at 82 dung cause i had scroll of cleansing and blast necklace.

  • i hate dung

Read full topic

I boss a lot, should’ve got the cls or ccb.

Read full topic

item.title: Chaotics
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Maul is good for when you need a really good hitter, like at revenants or as a finisher when pking. Rapier is good for general use, like a whip is used. Longsword is good for bosses and such since it is one handed and has great bonuses.

Read full topic

item.title: Chaotics
item.dc:creator: @Mod_L Mod L
item.description:
@Mod_L wrote:

maul is better… its for fast kills tbh, its fast money, rapier is better for fights with tough guys 130cb+

Read full topic

item.title: Chaotics
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Rapier overall, Idung for it

FOR MAGIC I RECOMEND CLS AND CBOW, FOR RANGE I RECOMMEND MAUL AND STAFF

But for melee, Rapier is the best overall, fast and strong.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Phaze One:

I <3 my CCB, i’d recommend getting one but not over Rapier. I also own a CLS and trust me, I still prefer to PVM with my rapier.

Ty for that

item.title: Chaotics
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:14, topic:418842”]I know what items I’m going to get, I already have scroll of cleansing etc.
I wanted to know what chaotic to get.
Ccb is really good by the looks of it, 33% higher range accuracy than r’cbow = 33% more chance of hitting + hitting higher than r c’bow. Rapiers like 20% better than whip so theres a bigger gap between ccb and r cbow than whip n rapier?[/quote]

Just because it has a 1/3 higher range accuracy than the rune crossbow, doesn’t mean it will inflict more damage. That’s only based on the bolts and your range level.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:12, topic:418842”][quote author=gravenfire23 link=topic=521378.msg3789323#msg3789323 date=1319156539]

[quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=521378.msg3789293#msg3789293 date=1319155073]

i personally like the chaotic maul

Same but I wouldn’t use it thaaat much i don’t think.

Rapier/Maul, but you will lose one pking

:L, I wouldn’t high risk world a Chaotic. Money is major easy to get in comparison to a chaotic in my opinion… Chaotics take the actual piss.
[/quote]Raiper: General PVM, Pking
Maul:Pking
CLS:Bossing
Staff:Max Mage

[/quote]Crossbow:Pointless peace of shit that doesn’t do anything a Rcbow can’t do.

But on my account (99 dung). I went with: All the skiling scrolls, rigour, tome of frost, 2 ring of rigours, maul, staff, rapier, crossbow, mercenary gloves, that good mage neck[/quote]Nex, Warring
